alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 07 at 2:26PM MST until July 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOHAVE COUNTY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SUNDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR PARTS OF SOUTHERN NEVADA AND MOHAVE COUNTY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR PARTS OF SOUTHERN NEVADA AND THE LAKE MEAD NATIONAL RECREATION AREA FOR STRONG WINDS WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Arizona...Fire weather zone 101. In Nevada...Fire weather zones 462, 465, and 466. * TIMING...11 am until 8 pm PDT/MST Sunday. * WIND...South to southwest wind 20 to 25 mph with gusts approaching 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity 5 to 10 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side
